LanguageData.Apparel_PackHunter_Toxic.label: Hunter Toxic Pack
LanguageData.Apparel_PackHunter_Toxic.description: Wearable pack that releases a hunter drone with toxic gas. The drone will approach the target and release toxic gas when within range.
LanguageData.Grenade_HunterPackToxic.label: Hunter Toxic Pack Capsule
LanguageData.Apparel_PackHunter_AntigrainWarhead.desc: Wearable pack that releases a hunter drone with an antigrain warhead. The drone will find a target and explode with destructive force.
LanguageData.Grenade_HunterPackToxic.label: Hunter Pack Capsule with Antigrain Warhead
LanguageData.Apparel_PackHunter_Incendiary.label: Hunter Pack with Incendiary Trap
LanguageData.Apparel_PackHunter_Incendiary.descriptio: Wearable pack that releases a hunter drone with an incendiary trap. The drone will find a target and set a trap that ignites the area.
LanguageData.Grenade_HunterPackToxic.label: Hunter Pack Capsule with Incendiary Trap
LanguageData.Apparel_PackHunter_EMP.label: Hunter Pack with EMP Trap
LanguageData.Apparel_PackHunter_EMP.description: Wearable pack that releases a hunter drone with an EMP trap. The drone will find a target and set a trap that emits a powerful EMP pulse, disabling electronics in the area.
LanguageData.Grenade_HunterPackToxic.label: Hunter Pack Capsule with EMP Trap
LanguageData.Apparel_PackHunter_Smoke.label: Hunter Pack with Smoke Trap
LanguageData.Apparel_PackHunter_Smoke.description: Wearable pack that releases a hunter drone with a smoke trap. The drone will find a target and set a trap that releases a cloud of smoke, reducing visibility in the area.
LanguageData.Grenade_HunterPackToxic.label: Hunter Pack Capsule with Smoke Trap
